description: App launcher for Android Wear is a highly polished and personalized launcher for your Android Wear watch.Features:- Browse or launch apps from your Android Wear smartwatch- Select one of many themes and customize it to look and act as you wish.- Choose between: Quick launcher, iWear launcher, Grid launcher, Row launcher and more coming!- Battery efficient!Supports:- LG G Watch- Samsung Gear Live- Moto 360- LG G Watch R- Sony SmartWatch 3- Asus ZenwatchTake your Android Wear watch to the next level.
descriptionHTML:
App launcher for Android Wear is a highly polished and personalized launcher for your Android Wear watch.

Features:

- Browse or launch apps from your Android Wear smartwatch
- Select one of many themes and customize it to look and act as you wish.
- Choose between: Quick launcher, iWear launcher, Grid launcher, Row launcher and more coming!
- Battery efficient!

Supports:

- LG G Watch
- Samsung Gear Live
- Moto 360
- LG G Watch R
- Sony SmartWatch 3
- Asus Zenwatch

Take your Android Wear watch to the next level.
comments: Provide shortcuts to apps without the trouble to swipe through a list to find them. Best setup for me is grid launcher with blacklisted apps ending in showing only six app that I use the most.
Battery drain on moto 360 I preferred it to wear launcher, since it is more responsive, but it drained the battery of my moto 360 like crazy.
A Great little launcher! Especially after making the switch from Apple. Just wondering if there is a way to arrange the apps in the iWatch theme.
Moto 360 I can't get it to work on my moto 360. Please fix this.
Sucks!!! This Wear launcher is terrible. It gives you 4 launchers to choose from, and one doesnt even work!
Easy to use. Just swipe to see apps instead of going through menus and searching for each program you want to use.
recentChanges: - you can now hide apps you don't want to see in app blacklist.
